data.actual_result: The cursor maintains a stretching form and does not change properly.
data.expected_result: The cursor is supposed to change according to where you are hovering over.
data.short_description: Cursor in Discord Overlay does not change (OBS)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up a game connected to Discord (i.e BF4) - Open the Discord Overlay Menu - Resize the overlay menus and notice the icon changes to a stretching cursor - Go to chat boxes and the cursor does not change to the typing cursor icon
